com.exlibris.dps.sdk.producer

Interface ProducerWebServices

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.exlibris.core.infra.svc.api.GenericWebService

    public interface ProducerWebServices
extends com.exlibris.core.infra.svc.api.GenericWebService
    Defines the API for creating/getting/removing/updating Producers, Producer Agents, and contacts.
    Author:
    zvif

      • createProducer

        java.lang.String createProducer(java.lang.String pdsHandle,
                              java.lang.String producerInfoXml)
        API for creating a new Producer.
        Parameters:
        pdsHandle - of a logged-in user, Mandatory
        producerInfoXml - created using the producer_info.xsd; holds all the data needed for creating a Producer
        Returns:
        XML reply created using the ws_response.xsd. If a new Producer is created, an ID is returned and if this action fails, an error is returned.

      • removeProducer

        java.lang.String removeProducer(java.lang.String pdsHandle,
                              java.lang.String prodcuerId)
        API for removing an existing Producer.
        Parameters:
        pdsHandle - of a logged-in user, Mandatory
        producerId - of the existing Producer to be removed
        Returns:
        XML reply created using the ws_response.xsd. If an existing Producer is removed, an ID is returned and if this action fails, an error is returned.

      • updateProducer

        java.lang.String updateProducer(java.lang.String pdsHandle,
                              java.lang.String prodcuerId,
                              java.lang.String producerInfoXml)
        API for updating an existing Producer.
        Parameters:
        pdsHandle - of a logged-in user, Mandatory
        producerId - of the existing Producer to be updated
        producerInfoXml - created using the producer_info.xsd; holds all the data needed for updating an existing Producer
        Returns:
        XML reply created using the ws_response.xsd. If the Producer is updated, an ID is returned and if this action fails, an error is returned.

      • getProducerDetails

        java.lang.String getProducerDetails(java.lang.String pdsHandle,
                                  java.lang.String prodcuerId)
        API for retrieving an existing Producer.
        Parameters:
        pdsHandle - of a logged-in user, Mandatory
        producerId - of the existing Producer to be retrieved
        Returns:
        XML reply created using the producer_info.xsd. Returns the requested Producer data; if this action fails, an error is returned using the ws_response.xsd.
